articles.title: Congratulations to President of Iceland
articles.content:
Congratulations to President of Iceland
Pyongyang, July 4 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, on June 28 sent a congratulatory message to Gudni Thorlacius Johannesson upon his election as president of the Republic of Iceland.
					 The message wished the president of Iceland success in his work for the prosperity of the country, expressing the belief that the bilateral relations would grow stronger in the mutual interests.

articles.title: Greetings to Rwandese President
articles.content:
Greetings to Rwandese President
Pyongyang, July 4 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Monday sent a message of greeting to Paul Kagame, president of Rwanda, on the national holiday of its people.
					 Expressing belief that the relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger in various fields, the message wished the president, government and people of Rwanda greater successes in their work for the prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Ethiopian Delegation Leaves for Home
articles.content:
Ethiopian Delegation Leaves for Home
Pyongyang, July 4 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Addis Ababa Youth Association of Ethiopia headed by President Gelta Ermiyas Mathewos left here for home on Monday.

articles.title: Vietnamese Delegation Arrives
articles.content:
Vietnamese Delegation Arrives
Pyongyang, July 4 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Vietnam General Confederation of Labor headed by Vice-President Nguyen Van Ngang arrived here on Monday.

articles.title: Meetings Held in Each Province
articles.content:
Meetings Held in Each Province
Pyongyang, July 4 (KCNA) -- Meetings of service personnel and people in North Phyongan, South Hwanghae, Jagang, Kangwon and South Hamgyong Provinces took place on Monday to hail Marshal Kim Jong Un's election as chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK.
					 Attending there were officials of the local party, power organs, working people's organizations, industrial establishments, farms and universities, service personnel of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, people from all walks of life and youths and students.
					
					 Reports were delivered to be followed by congratulatory speeches. 
					
					 The reporters and speakers extended the highest glory and the warmest congratulations to Kim Jong Un on his election as chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK at the Fourth Session of the 13th Supreme People's Assembly, reflecting the ardent reverence of all service personnel and people.
					
					 They said that Juche Korea has demonstrated its dignity and might before the world thanks to the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 They went on:
					
					 The Korean People's Army will firmly trust and follow the respected supreme commander Kim Jong Un only, form a manifold fortress and become iron shields to devotedly defend the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun no matter how often the world may change.
					
					 They called for bringing about an unprecedented production surge by fully tapping reserves and possibilities and dynamically conducting the socialist emulation for increased production in all fields and units.
					
					 The representatives of youths and students said they would create new legendary tales about youth in fields for building a socialist power and courageously turn out in the struggle for defending the country if the time comes to fight a final decisive battle.
					
					 The reporters and speakers underscored the need to wage a more dynamic struggle for successfully carrying out the WPK's plan for building a socialist power with the high pride and self-esteem of having elected him to the top post of the DPRK.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, July 4 (KCNA) -- Foreign guests and overseas Koreans including a delegation of the Vietnam General Confederation of Labor and a delegation of Korean youths and students in Japan visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Monday.
					 They laid bouquets before the statues of the great leaders and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Floral Baskets, Congratulatory Letters to Kim Jong Un from Foreign Diplomatic Envoys
articles.content:
Floral Baskets, Congratulatory Letters to Kim Jong Un from Foreign Diplomatic Envoys
Pyongyang, July 4 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket and congratulatory letter from Lao Ambassador to the DPRK Phonekham Inthaboualy, a floral basket from Palestinian Ambassador Ismail Ahmed Mohamed Hasan and a congratulatory letter from Iranian Ambassador Mansour Chavoshi on his election as chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK.
					 They were separately handed to an official concerned on Monday.

articles.title: Kangso Mineral Water Output on Increase
articles.content:
Kangso Mineral Water Output on Increase
Pyongyang, July 4 (KCNA) -- The Kangso Mineral Water Factory in the DPRK has established new production process of casked mineral water with the capacity of thousands of tons per year.
					 The factory set up a sterilizing process by its own technology and applied PLC software to integrated production system, putting the production process on a germ-free and dust-free basis.
					
					 The Kangso mineral water is considered to be efficacious for liver diseases, fatness, diabetes, digestive trouble, etc.

articles.title: Method of Cultivating Foreign Vegetations Confirmed
articles.content:
Method of Cultivating Foreign Vegetations Confirmed
Pyongyang, July 4 (KCNA) -- The Central Botanical Garden in the DPRK made achievements in confirming methods of cultivating and propagating over 790 species of gift plants presented to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il by heads of state and prominent political, public and academic figures of foreign countries and overseas Koreans.
					 Among them are Podocarpus macrophyllus, Wisteria floribunda, Cedrus deodara, Pinus parviflora, Osmanthus fragrans and Psidium guajava.
					
					 The botanical garden is also paying deep attention to maintaining and disseminating pure breeds of Kimilsungia and Kimjongilia.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung, Iron-willed Commander
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung, Iron-willed Commander
Pyongyang, July 4 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung is an iron-willed commander who led the 1950-1953 Fatherland Liberation War to victory and inspired the world progressive people to the vigorous anti-U.S. struggle.
					 Ex-President of Portugal Francisco Da Costa Gomes, who was the chief of staff of the Portuguese forces stationed in Macao during the Korean War, said: All the U.S. operational plans at that time were worked out after repeated discussions by state heads and chiefs of staffs and many other generals of the U.S. and its allies, Western countries. But, General Kim Il Sung frustrated all of them single-handedly. Witnessing this fact, I came to realize that he is the great commander, the one and only gifted strategist in the world.
					
					 As Gomes said, the victory in the war was that of President Kim Il Sung's military strategies and tactics.
					
					 He defeated the enemy's numerical and technical superiority with his unique stratagem and war tactics and distinguished commanding art and spoiled all the operational schemes of the U.S. imperialists such as adventurous "blitzkrieg" and "large-scale offensive". 
					
					 His war strategies and tactics included consecutive offensive, combined operation of large and small units, night action, assault, formation of the second front, siege warfare and position warfare.
					
					 Under his guidance such war movements were also conducted as sniper-team movement, direct-firing gun movement, aircraft-hunting team movement and tank-hunting team movement.
					
					After all, the Korean People's Army shot down 3,000 enemy war planes in two years after the start of the aircraft-hunting team movement and 200-odd tanks in one year.
					
					In the three-year war provoked by the U.S. imperialist aggressors, the DPRK army and people commanded by Kim Il Sung killed or captured at least 1,567,120 enemy troops, including 405,490 GIs, and seized or damaged 12,220 planes, 3,250 tanks and armored vehicles and many other pieces of military and combat technical equipment.
					
					 The DPRK's victory in the war was of historic significance as it shattered the myth of the U.S. imperialism's "mightiness" and ushered in a new era of anti-imperialist, anti-U.S. struggle on a worldwide scale.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Demands U.S. Roll back Its Hostile Policy toward DPRK
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Demands U.S. Roll back Its Hostile Policy toward DPRK
Pyongyang, July 4 (KCNA) -- Recently, a vice-director of an institute for international political and military studies in a Western country termed the row of "sanctions" being kicked up by the U.S. against the DPRK over the latter's access to nukes and rocket launches for self-defence the height of double and treble standards unreasonable in the light of international law.
					 Not a few Western media including Yahoo News and Reddit of the U.S. made analysis and comments, claiming that no matter how frequently the UNSC may release "sanctions resolutions" and press statements, they cannot hold anything in check, to say nothing of the DPRK's rocket launches, a proof that "sanctions" themselves prove unworkable.
					
					 This tells that the fair-minded international community is acknowledging the illegality of the U.S. "sanctions" against the DPRK and their inevitable bankruptcy.
					
					 With no rhetoric to paint its anti-DPRK "sanctions" as ones for peace and security can the U.S. put under carpet the criminal nature of its vicious hostile moves against the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. kept mum about the satellite launch conducted by south Korea with other's help in January 2013. In 2012 it allowed south Korea to expand its missile firing range so that it might put the whole territory of the DPRK within its firing range and strike it.
					
					 The U.S. is getting desperate in its nuclear blackmail and modernization of its nuclear force in a bid to stifle the DPRK and dominate the world but is working hard to ratchet up the "sanctions" against the DPRK over its steps for self-defence which are just in the light of international law.
					
					 In a word, its "sanctions" racket is nothing but a hideous scenario for aggression as it is aimed to suffocate the economy of the DPRK and deteriorate the overall material and cultural life of its people under the pretext of scuttling its nuclear and missile programs and thus realize the wild ambition for stifling it, a main link in Washington's chain efforts for dominating the world.
					
					 It is quite natural that the U.S. illegal moves against the DPRK being stepped up pursuant to the outrageous hostile policy toward it are sparking strong protest and denunciation from the DPRK and the world public.
					
					 The service personnel and people of the DPRK have turned Juche Korea into the only independent, self-supporting and self-developing great power in the world despite the "harshest sanctions" of the U.S. imperialists and their vassal forces.
					
					 The DPRK has emerged a nuclear power in the East possessed of miniaturized, light and diversified nukes and the strongest military power with medium long-range strategic ballistic rocket of its own style.
					
					 The more desperate efforts being made by the U.S. to escalate its  "sanctions" and pressure upon the DPRK would only compel the latter to further bolster up its capabilities for self-development and retaliatory nuclear strike.
					
					 The U.S. anachronistic hostile policy toward the DPRK will only precipitate its miserable self-ruin.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Implementing Independent Revolutionary Line and Methods of Great Leaders
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Implementing Independent Revolutionary Line and Methods of Great Leaders
Pyongyang, July 4 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Monday in an editorial says that the DPRK which is highly dignified with Juche and strong with Songun is an invincible power emerging victorious thanks to the independent revolutionary line and methods clarified by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					 They were the peerless political elders who led the Korean revolution to victory, pursuant to the independent revolutionary line and methods, the editorial says, adding:
					
					 They solved all problems arising in carrying out the socialist cause in an independent way in conformity with the requirements of the Korean revolution, the interests of the Korean people and the specific conditions of the country, while maintaining the transparent revolutionary stand that one should carry out one's revolution in a responsible manner.
					
					 To thoroughly embody their independent revolutionary line and methods is a sure guarantee for accelerating the final victory of the socialist cause of Juche.
					
					 The socialist cause of Juche is sure to triumph as the independent revolutionary line and methods of the great leaders inspire our party and people to a dynamic struggle.
					
					 The outstanding idea and line for independent reunification, fair proposals for national reunification set forth by the great leaders and the immortal Songun revolutionary feats performed by them serve as an immortal banner to foil the moves of the anti-reunification forces at home and abroad, accelerate the country's reunification and reliably preserve global peace and security.
					
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un is an outstanding leader of our party and people who has led the cause of the Juche revolution, the cause of the Songun revolution to one victory after another, true to the noble intention and immortal revolutionary feats of the great leaders.
					
					 The editorial calls upon all Koreans to get united close around Kim Jong Un and dynamically advance along the road of independence, Songun and socialism indicated by the great leaders.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Denounces Remarks of S. Korean Puppet Minister of Unification
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Denounces Remarks of S. Korean Puppet Minister of Unification
Pyongyang, July 4 (KCNA) -- Days ago, the Committee for Diplomacy and Unification of the puppet National Assembly of south Korea heard a report on the work of the Ministry of Unification. Hong Yong Phyo, puppet minister of Unification, talked rubbish that the north-south dialogue would give "only time and justification to the north" and that dialogue under the present situation would be little short of "being pulled by the north." He spouted sophism that it is the stand of south Korea to "force the north to change through sanctions first, and then have a meaningful dialogue."
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday says in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 What traitor Hong uttered revealed the sinister intention to save the "north policy" from bankruptcy at any cost and stand in confrontation with the north to the last.
					
					 These days Park Geun Hye is making desperate efforts to save her "north policy" from a total failure and shore up the bankrupt "sanctions" row against the north, never opening her mouth without blustering that the effect of the "sanctions against the north" is becoming distinct and "sanctions and pressure are the only means for forcing the north to dismantle its nukes."
					
					 Hong Yong Phyo is going more reckless than any others in sticking to the confrontation policy towards the north, dancing to the tune of the boss of Chongwadae.
					
					 The DPRK is making ever greater leap forward despite the harshest-ever "sanctions" against it. Much upset by this, Park is going off hysteric fit almost every day. Against this backdrop, Hong is crying out for "leading the north to changes through sanctions first," more obstinately opposing the north-south dialogue than anyone else.
					
					 Now the south Korean puppet authorities are busy with the anti-DPRK campaign, trumpeting about tightened "sanctions and pressure on it," failing to understand how things are going in the world like frogs in the well, but it will get them nowhere.

articles.title: Anti-"Government" Struggle Unabated in S. Korea
articles.content:
Anti-"Government" Struggle Unabated in S. Korea
Pyongyang, July 4 (KCNA) -- Actions against the south Korean authorities' unpopular rule have escalated near the building of the puppet government in Sejong City of south Korea, according to south Korean CBS on July 2.
					 It said that the number of rallies and demons has increased outside the building of the "government" this year, an indication of growing discontent of the people with the policy of the regime.
					
					 The number of rallies, each attended by more than 400 people, reached 35 cases in 2014 but it increased to 50 cases this year and this is attributable to the "government's" refusal to have dialogue with people, CBS noted, adding:
					
					 The "government" made a series of proposals for the reform such as the system for paying salaries according piece rate and de-nationalization of energy industry but discontent of people is growing due to its lack of understanding.

articles.title: S. Korean People Called on to Struggle against Fascist Dictatorial Rule
articles.content:
S. Korean People Called on to Struggle against Fascist Dictatorial Rule
Pyongyang, July 4 (KCNA) -- The Korea Solidarity for Independent Reunification and Democracy in a statement on July 1 called on the people from all walks of life in south Korea to turn out in the action against the puppet regime's fascist dictatorial rule.
					 No normal progressive activities are allowed under the present authorities' tyrannical rule whereby the freedom of thinking, expression and association is not guaranteed, the statement deplored, adding:
					
					 No violence can arrest the just struggle for rooting out social evils.

articles.title: Anniversary of Demise of Kim Il Sung Commemorated in China, Pakistan
articles.content:
Anniversary of Demise of Kim Il Sung Commemorated in China, Pakistan
Pyongyang, July 4 (KCNA) -- A Chinese magazine and Pakistani newspaper dedicated special write-ups to the 22nd anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The June issue of the Chinese Hong Kong magazine International Link carried an article illustrated with a portrait of smiling Kim Il Sung and his photos and pictures of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The magazine noted in an article titled "Kim Il Sung, great man of the century" that a lot of great persons were recorded in the history of humankind but there is no such a great person as President Kim Il Sung of socialist Korea who has been boundlessly revered by all people century after century.
					
					 It introduced in detail the ideological and theoretical exploits, feats for national liberation and war victory and immortal exploits of Kim Il Sung for accomplishing the cause of global independence, lauding him as the pioneer and guide of the era of independence who founded the Juche idea and indicated the way to be followed by humankind and prominent elder statesman who had led the cause of human independence under the uplifted banner of independence against imperialism all his life.
					
					 Lauding him as the peerless sage who moved the world with his noble human love and virtue, it stressed that his warm human love and great tolerance were not only for the Korean people but also for humanity irrespective of nations, nationalities, religious belief and political view and he would always live in the hearts of mankind.
					
					 It carried photos of Mirae Scientists Street, Sci-Tech Complex, Pyongyang Baby Home and Orphanage.
					
					 The June 28th issue of the Pakistani newspaper Election Times in an article "People's father" said that the President was the happiest when he spent time with children as he had the transparent outlook on the younger generation of putting forward children as king of country and sparing nothing for them.

articles.title: Koreans in U.S. Welcome DPRK's Proposal for Opening Great National Meeting for Reunification
articles.content:
Koreans in U.S. Welcome DPRK's Proposal for Opening Great National Meeting for Reunification
Pyongyang, July 4 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Federation of Koreans in the U.S. in a statement on June 30 said that the danger of a war is increasing as the inter-Korean relations have reached the phase of acute confrontation and the situation on the Korean peninsula is so tense that a war may break out any moment.
					 Against this backdrop in an open letter sent to the authorities, political parties, organizations and individuals in south Korea and abroad, reflecting the will of Koreans for independent reunification, the north proposed to open a great national meeting attended by Koreans overseas and from the north and the south before and after August 15 this year marking the 71st anniversary of Korea's liberation, the statement said.
					
					 It highly appreciated the north's will to put an end to the history of division and strive harder than any others to realize the desire of Koreans for creating the history of reunification, history of national prosperity, calling on all Koreans including those in the south side to accept the north's proposal without any condition.
					
					 The will of the north represents that of Koreans as it clarified the willingness to have candid, face-to-face meeting with anyone irrespective of political view, religious belief and ism if it is helpful to the improvement of the inter-Korean relations and the settlement of reunification issue, it noted. 
					
					 It called on all Koreans overseas and in the north and the south to dynamically pave a venue to independent reunification under the uplifted banner of national independence, the banner of great national unity.

articles.title: German Body Hits out at GIs' Atrocities during Korean War
articles.content:
German Body Hits out at GIs' Atrocities during Korean War
Pyongyang, July 4 (KCNA) -- The Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany released a statement on June 27 in the June 25-July 27 month of anti-U.S. joint struggle.
					 Giving a detailed account of the inhumane crimes the U.S. imperialist committed by reducing the territory of the DPRK into ashes through the most brutal bombardment and indiscriminately massacring innocent people, the statement said:
					
					 The cruelty and brutality of the U.S. is unheard-of in the world history of wars and human history.
					
					 The U.S., still occupying south Korea, is blocking the Korean people's way to independent reunification and scheming to ignite a new war on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 Now is the time to take the U.S. persisting in bloody massacre, seized with misanthropic idea, to international court to punish it in the eyes of the world progressives of conscience.
					
					 It is just the U.S. which should be slapped with sanctions and isolated.
					
					 Genuine peace can never settle on the earth as long as the U.S. styling itself "guardian of human rights" and "Interpol" and its stooges go scot-free.

articles.title: Peruvian Political Party Hails DPRK's Successful Test-fire of Strategic Ballistic Rocket
articles.content:
Peruvian Political Party Hails DPRK's Successful Test-fire of Strategic Ballistic Rocket
Pyongyang, July 4 (KCNA) -- The People's Front of Workers, Peasants and Students of Peru released a statement on June 27 congratulating Juche Korea on its successful test-fire of the surface-to-surface medium long-range strategic ballistic rocket Hwasong-10.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The DPRK strikingly demonstrated again its self-defence capability through the test-fire of the strategic ballistic rocket.
					
					 The respected HE Kim Jong Un supervised the test-fire on the spot.
					
					 The successful test-fire provided the DPRK with a sure sci-tech guarantee for developing the strategic weapon system in the future.
					
					 It instilled confidence in sure victory and optimism into the service personnel and people of the DPRK and strikingly demonstrated before the world its invincibility once again.
					
					 Taking this opportunity, we condemn the U.S. for its base act of egging the UN secretary general on to forward a letter denying the DPRK's right to satellite launch.
					
					 The DPRK will further bolster up its nuclear deterrent for self-defence both in quality and quantity to cope with the hostile policy of the U.S. and as ever exercise its right to explore space for peaceful purposes no matter what others may say.
					
					 The DPRK will always emerge victorious.

articles.title: Works of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Un Introduced by Hungarian Body, Newspaper
articles.content:
Works of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Un Introduced by Hungarian Body, Newspaper
Pyongyang, July 4 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung's work "Strengthening the Party and Enhancing Its Role Is the Basic Guarantee for the Victory of Revolution" and supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "The Great Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and Our People" were carried by the Hungarian Committee for Remembering President Kim Il Sung on a newspaper and website on June 30 on the 22nd anniversary of demise of the President.
					 Kim Il Sung's work published on Oct. 10, Juche 79 (1990) deals with the significance of the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the history of the WPK which has developed into the revolutionary one of Juche.
					
					 It also indicates the tasks and ways of the WPK.
					
					 Kim Jong Un's work published on April 20, Juche 101 (2012) deals with the revolutionary exploits performed by Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il all their lives.
					
					 It also indicates the tasks for firmly defending and maintaining their ideas and exploits and making them always shine.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Russia
Pyongyang, July 4 (KCNA) -- A committee for remembering President Kim Il Sung was formed by the Party of Communists of Russia on June 29.
					 M. A. Suraikin, chairman of the Central Committee of the party, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee decided to post Kim Il Sung's exploits on a website and organize events on the 22nd anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Nigeria
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Nigeria
Pyongyang, July 4 (KCNA) -- The Committee of the People's Progressive Party of Nigeria for Remembering President Kim Il Sung was formed on June 28.
					 The legal advisor to the party was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee decided to give wide publicity to Kim Il Sung's immortal revolutionary exploits and brilliant career and the Korean people's struggle for building a socialist power of Juche and making the whole world independent under the wise guidance of supreme leader Kim Jong Un and hold various events on the 22nd anniversary of demise of Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Sweden
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Sweden
Pyongyang, July 4 (KCNA) -- A Swedish committee for remembering President Kim Il Sung was formed in Stockholm on June 29.
					 Christer Lundgren, chairman of the Sweden-Korea Friendship Association, an executive member of the Goteborg Committee of the Communist Party of Sweden, and Oskar Molleby, chief of the Swedish Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, were elected co-chairpersons of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold political and cultural events for praising the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Il Sung on the 22nd anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Iceland
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Iceland
Pyongyang, July 4 (KCNA) -- A committee for remembering President Kim Il Sung was formed in Reykjavik, Iceland on June 29.
					 Jon Arni Halldorsson, general secretary of the Iceland-DPRK Friendship and Cultural Society, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee decided to significantly organize political and cultural events to praise the revolutionary career and undying feats of Kim Il Sung on the 22nd anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Serbia
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Serbia
Pyongyang, July 4 (KCNA) -- A Serbian national committee for remembering President Kim Il Sung was formed in Belgrade on June 30.
					 Marijann Kubik, international secretary of the New Yugoslav Communist Party, was elected chairman of the national committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold various political and cultural events for praising the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Il Sung and give wide publicity to the Korean people's struggle for defending the country's sovereignty and building a socialist power under the wise guidance of supreme leader Kim Jong Un on the 22nd anniversary of demise of Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on Polish Websites
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on Polish Websites
Pyongyang, July 4 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "The Great Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and Our People" was separately posted on the website of the Polish Branch of the Korean Friendship Association and the Polish website DPRK on June 29.
					 The work published on April 20, Juche 101 (2012) deals with the revolutionary exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il all their lives.
					
					 It also indicates the tasks for firmly defending and maintaining their ideas and exploits and making them always shine.
					
					 Posted on the websites were 50 photos dealing with the immortal exploits of Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe felicitaciones de representantes diplomaticos
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe felicitaciones de representantes diplomaticos
Pyongyang, 4 de julio (ACNC) -- Con motivo de la eleccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un como Presidente del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el embajador lao en Corea, Phonekham Inthaboualy, le dedico un cesto de flores y carta de felicitacion.
					El embajador palestino, Ismail Ahmed Mohamed Hasan, y el irani, Mansour Chavoshi, le dirigieron un cesto de flores y una carta de felicitacion, respectivamente.
					
					Los cestos y cartas fueron entregados el dia 4 por separados a un funcionario coreano.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita a presidente de Islandia recien electo
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita a presidente de Islandia recien electo
Pyongyang, 4 de julio (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, emitio el 28 de junio un mensaje de felicitacion a Gudni Thorlacius Johannesson, electo presidente de la Republica de Islandia.
					Convencido de que las relaciones entre ambos paises se desarrollen mas conforme al interes mutuo, el remitente desea exitos al destinatario en sus labores para la prosperidad del pais.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam envía mensaje de felicitación al presidente rwandés
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam envía mensaje de felicitación al presidente rwandés
Pyongyang, 4 de julio (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la República Popular Democrática de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envió el día 4 un mensaje de felicitación al presidente de Rwanda, Paul Kagame, con motivo de la fiesta nacional del pueblo africano.
					Convencido de que las relaciones de amistad y cooperación existentes entre dos países se ampliarán y se desarrollarán en varios dominios, el remitente deseó mayores éxitos en los trabajos del destinatario, el gobierno y el pueblo de Rwanda por la prosperidad del país.

articles.title: ACNC comenta opiniones sobre la politica hostil anti-RPDC
articles.content:
ACNC comenta opiniones sobre la politica hostil anti-RPDC
Pyongyang, 4 de julio (ACNC) -- Hace poco, el vicepresidente de un instituto de asuntos politicos y militares internacionales del Occidente califico de climax de aplicacion de la pauta de doble y triple rasero e infundada segun el derecho internacional la campana de "sancion" que esta librando Estados Unidos cuestionando la posesion de armas nucleares y el lanzamiento de cohete por parte de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea como medidas de autodefensa.
					No pocos medios occidentales, inclusive Yahoo News y Reddit de EE.UU., analizan y evaluan que aunque fueron publicados las "resoluciones de sancion" del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU y el comunicado, estos no detienen nada, lejos del lanzamiento de cohete de Corea, y asi se ponen en duda los efectos de la "sancion".
					
					Estas opiniones muestran que la imparcial sociedad internacional reconoce la ilegalidad de la campana de "sancion" de Estados Unidos contra la RPDC y el caracter inevitable de su fracaso.
					
					Aunque EE.UU. describe tanto su campana de "sancion" anti-RPDC como empresa para la paz y seguridad, no puede ocultar el caracter criminal de sus infames hostilidades.
					
					EE.UU. no cuestiono ni un apice el lanzamiento de satelite artificial ejecutado en enero de 2013 por los titeres surcoreanos con la ayuda de otro pais, y en el ano anterior, cancelo la medida de limitar el alcance de misiles surcoreanos para que estos artefactos pudieran atacar todas partes del territorio norcoreano.
					
					Recurriendo al chantaje nuclear y modernizacion de armas nucleares para atropellar a la RPDC y tomar la hegemonia mundial, se enfrasca en la campana de "sancion" cuestionado las justas medidas autodefensivas de ella.
					
					En una palabra, la campana de "sancion" tiene el objetivo de aplastar a la RPDC, problema clave de la heguemonia mundial, al asfixiar su economia y destruir todos los dominios de la vida material y cultural del pueblo coreano bajo el pretexto de frenar el plan de desarrollo de armas nucleares y misiles norcoreanos.
					
					Es natural que tales acciones agresivas produjeran fuerte rechazo y denuncia de la RPDC y la sociedad internacional.
					
					El ejercito y pueblo coreanos convirtieron a la Corea del Juche en la unica potencia autarquica, autosostenida y autofortalecida en el fragor de la lucha por frustrar la barbara "sancion superintensa" de los imperialistas norteamericanos y sus seguidores.
					
					La RPDC se hizo potencia militar del Oriente provista de ojivas nucleares minimizadas, aligeradas y diversificadas y hasta de cohete balistico estrategico de mediano y largo alcance, desarrollado por el estilo coreano.
					
					Cuanto mas EE.UU. recurra a la "sancion" y presion anti-RPDC, tanto mas se elevara la capacidad de esta de autofortalecimiento y represalia nuclear.
					
					La anacronica y obstinada politica hostil de EE.UU. le llevara a la autodestruccion tragica.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun critica actitud negativa al dialogo de Hong Yong Phyo
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun critica actitud negativa al dialogo de Hong Yong Phyo
Pyongyang, 4 de julio (ACNC) -- En el reciente Comite de Asuntos Exteriores y Unificacion de la Asamblea Nacional titere del Sur de Corea tuvo lugar el informe de los trabajos del Ministerio de Unificacion. En esta ocasion, el ministro de Unificacion Hong Yong Phyo dijo que el dialogo entre ambas partes coreanas dara solo al Norte de Corea el "tiempo y justificacion" y abrirlo en las actuales circunstancias no pasa de ser un "gesto de dejarse llevar por el Norte". Agrego que su posicion consiste en proceder al "dialogo significativo" despues de "introducir el cambio del Norte al aplicarle primero la sancion".
					El disparate del traidor Hong deja conocer su siniestra intencion de mantener a toda costa la "politica sobre el Norte" condenada al fracaso total y enfrentarse hasta el final con la parte connacional.
					
					Asi subraya Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual divulgado el dia 4 y continua:
					
					En estos dias, Park Geun-hye dice que la "sancion contra el Norte" surte efectos visibles y "esta y la presion son el unico remedio para obligar al Norte (de Corea) a renunciar las armas nucleares".
					
					Sumandose al intento de la inquilina de Chongwadae de dar alientos a la deprimida campana de "sancion" anti-RPDC, Hong Yong Phyo se puso a la cabeza en mantener la politica conflictiva rechazando obstinadamente el dialogo intercoreano.
					
					La mandataria surcoreana esta muy inquietada ahora por el hecho de que la RPDC esta dando saltos cada dia mas altos a pesar de la "sancion" sin precedentes en la historia.
					
					Es que los titeres surcoreanos estan aplicando en balde la "sancion" y "presion" contra la RPDC.
